content.value:
A Quiet Place and Natural

Violet Park, offers a stay warm, cozy and surrounded by nature, close to the main attractions of the city. Located in the heart of Bogota, where the various and best tourist sites featuring in our Capital.

In Bogotá, we are the best option if you are looking for an economical, familiar place and close to everything. The historic center is 7 kilometers away there you can find Monserrate, Gold Museum, La Candelaria, Plaza de Bolívar and El Chorro de Quevedo. Within 3 minutes walk you will find restaurants and small supermarkets, 3 minutes away is Gran Estación Centro Comercial as well as the Botanical Garden and El Campín Stadium is 3 kilometers away.

The rooms here feature bright décor, with pop art influences. They include a wardrobe, a flat-screen cable TV and a private or shared bathroom.
At Violeta Park Hostel you will find a communal kitchen, while other facilities offered include a shared lounge, a tour desk and luggage storage.
Restaurants and small supermarkets can be found within a 15-minute walk, and El Dorado International Airport is 15 minutes' drive away.

description.description: Violeta Park Hostel is a modern hostel with a variety of accommodation options, located in the heart of Bogotá, just 12 minutes from the airport, a few steps from Simón Bolivar Park, behind Can and National University Hospital. We have comfortable and modern art-filled rooms that feature flat TV, cable channels and free high-speed WiFi connection, where you will feel at home!
